description_data.value: ** RESERVED ** This candidate has been reserved by an organization or individual that will use it when announcing a new security problem. When the candidate has been publicized, the details for this candidate will be provided.

descriptions.value: VSeeFace through 1.13.38.c2 allows attackers to cause a denial of service (application hang) via a spoofed UDP packet containing at least 10 digits in JSON data.

VSeeFace hasta la versión 1.13.38.c2 permite a los atacantes provocar una denegación de servicio (cuelgue de la aplicación) a través de un paquete UDP falsificado que contiene al menos 10 dígitos en datos JSON.
